name: ClaritySync Notification Center
description: A beautiful, customizable notification center widget for displaying and managing your Notion tasks. Perfect for students, professionals, and anyone who wants to keep track of their tasks and deadlines.

read_database.description: Read task data from your Notion databases to display in the notification center widget

read_database_structure.description: Understand database schema to properly display and filter your tasks

data_retention.notion_data: Not stored permanently - processed in real-time only
data_retention.configuration_data: Stored locally in user's browser only
data_retention.error_logs: Retained for 30 days maximum for debugging purposes

security.access_control: User must explicitly share databases with integration
security.data_sharing: No data shared with third parties
security.storage: No permanent storage of user data

use_cases: Student task management and assignment tracking
features: Real-time task display from Notion databases
Filtering by course, type, due date, and completion status

compliance.notion_guidelines: Fully compliant with Notion integration guidelines
